name: Borderlands 2: How Marcus Saved Mercenary Day
name_original: Borderlands 2: How Marcus Saved Mercenary Day
description:
Borderlands 2: How Marcus Saved Mercenary Day is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It came out on 17-12-2013. It was published by 2K Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Borderlands 2: How Marcus Saved Mercenary Day on PC and PlayStation 3.
